argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ax-hv0cl | |- 0h e. ~H |
| 2 |  | #P_ax-hvcom | |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ 0h e. ~H ) -> ( A +h 0h ) = ( 0h +h A ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( A e. ~H -> ( A +h 0h ) = ( 0h +h A ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_ax-hvaddid | |- ( A e. ~H -> ( A +h 0h ) = A ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( A e. ~H -> ( 0h +h A ) = A ) |
